name: WorkFlowy Orange Desktop Light Theme
description: This is a light color theme for WorkFlowy that uses a light orange page on an orange wood desktop.
additional_info:
Changing to a different theme within WorkFlowy settings allows you to change the color of the top navigation menu bar and various pop-out menus created by WorkFlowy.

Shown: WorkFlowy's Default theme (light). You may wish to instead use WorkFlowy's Vintage theme (dark top navigation menu bar, light pop-out menus) or Dark theme.
